title: #1492 What's Dangerous About My Opinion?
itunes:title: #1492 What's Dangerous About My Opinion?
description:
Drew opens the show continuing with his reaction to the call we took on Monday in his assessment of the Covid-19 situation and the patterns he has observed. They also discuss the difference in behavior between those who have power and those who feel 'empowered'.  Later they turn to the phones and speak to a caller who wants their thoughts on the National Anthem leading Adam to an epic rant on the subject, they also speak with a caller who has previously had Covid and is looking for Dr. Drew's advice on how to best monitor his levels of protection from a second infection.  

Please Support Our Sponsors:

TenThousand.cc, code ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
LiveXLive.com/ADAMandDREW
